overview: Pedavi Datani Matokatundhi (English: I Have a word which I haven't Told Yet) is an Indian Telugu language, fantasy romantic comedy film directed by T Guru Prasad, written by TG Keerthi Kumar and produced by Aditi and TG Keerthi Kumar.[1][2][3] It features Raavan Reddy and Payal Wadhwa and Naresh in the lead roles.[4][5][6]. The film was released on July 27, 2018.[7]
title: Pedavi Datani Matokatundhi
